thread.section_title: Hotel Elysees Union - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Prefect base.
thread.title_full: Prefect base. - Review of Hotel Elysees Union, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Steve Jen M
title: Prefect base.
text:
First time at Hotel Elysees, but if I get my way of won't be my last.
Its greatest strength is its location. Firstly avenue kleber is positioned off one of the Arc de Triumphs 'stars', down one of the most elegant streets and neighbouring the rather more famous shopping street!
However this still is not the highlight, which had to be a room side view of tour eiffel! See photograph.
The hotel is a 20 minute walk, give our take to the eiffel tour one-way and a slightly less jaunt the other way to arc de triumph.
Metro stations are about the same distance, with the particularly handy Charles de Gaulle Etoile position just off the arc de triumph, with lines leading to RER stations, La Louvre, Notre-Dame and the beautiful monmarche area.
The hotel its self is small, but beautifully in its decor and is very clean and has its own wonderful charm, amongst some of Paris's more established architectural super stars.
It's a 3 star hotel, however it's easily a three star, it probably deserves at least another half star if that was possibly.
The hotel is manned 24/7, with pleasant, multilingual staff.
Thank you Hotel Elysees for being part of my Paris adventure, I will return.
